model_outputs.question:
In the following sentences, explain the antecedent of the pronoun (which thing the pronoun refers to), or state that it is ambiguous.
Sentence: The patient was referred to the specialist because he had a rare skin condition.
Options:
(A) The patient had a skin condition
(B) The specialist had a skin condition
(C) Ambiguous
model_outputs.model_answer:
The antecedent of the pronoun "he" in the sentence "The patient was referred to the specialist because he had a rare skin condition" is "The patient". 

This can be determined by identifying the subject of the sentence, which is "The patient". The pronoun "he" refers back to the subject of the sentence, which in this case is "The patient". Therefore, option (A) is the correct answer.
